Masks clouds and shadows

ee_Image_maskClouds.Rd

Masks clouds and shadows in an ee.Image. Valid just for Surface Reflectance products. This function may mask water as well as clouds for the Sentinel-3 Radiance product

ee_Image_maskClouds(
  image,
  method = "cloud_prob",
  prob = 60,
  maskCirrus = TRUE,
  maskShadows = TRUE,
  scaledImage = FALSE,
  dark = 0.15,
  cloudDist = 1000,
  buffer = 250,
  cdi = NULL
)

Arguments

image

An ee$Image
method

The method to mask clouds. Available options: "cloud_prob" and "qa".
prob

A number between 0 and 100. Cloud probability threshold. Valid just for method = 'cloud_prob'. This parameter is ignored for Landsat products. Default value is 60.
maskCirrus

Logical Whether to mask cirrus clouds. Valid just for method = 'qa'. This parameter is ignored for Landsat products. Default value is TRUE.
maskShadows

Logical. Whether to mask cloud shadows. For more info see 'Braaten, J. 2020. Sentinel-2 Cloud Masking with s2cloudless. Google Earth Engine, Community Tutorials'. Default value is TRUE.
scaledImage

Logical. Whether the pixel values are scaled to the range <0,1> (reflectance values). This parameter is ignored for Landsat products. The default value is FALSE.
dark

: Numerical value between <0-1>. NIR threshold. NIR values below this threshold are potential cloud shadows. This parameter is ignored for Landsat products. Default value is 0.15
cloudDist

Numerical value. Maximum distance in meters (m) to look for cloud shadows from cloud edges. This parameter is ignored for Landsat products. Default value is 1000.
buffer

Numerical value. Distance in meters (m) to dilate cloud and cloud shadows objects. This parameter is ignored for Landsat products. Default value is 250 meters.
cdi

Numerical value between <-1, 1>. Cloud Displacement Index threshold. Values below this threshold are considered potential clouds. A cdi = None means that the index is not used. For more info see 'Frantz, D., HaS, E., Uhl, A., Stoffels, J., Hill, J. 2018. Improvement of the Fmask algorithm for Sentinel-2 images: Separating clouds from bright surfaces based on parallax effects. Remote Sensing of Environment 2015: 471-481'. Default value is NULL.

Value

ee.Image with a Cloud-shadow masked image.

Examples

if (FALSE) {
library(rgeeExtra)

ee_Initialize()

img <- ee$ImageCollection("COPERNICUS/S2_SR") %>%
  ee$ImageCollection$first() %>%
  ee_Image_maskClouds(prob = 75,buffer = 300,cdi = -0.5)

names(img)
}
